alert.note: Alert for Collin; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:29PM CDT until June 11 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hunt County in north central Texas... Southeastern Collin County in north central Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 929 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenville City Lakes, or near Greenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wylie, Greenville, Commerce, Royse City, Princeton, Farmersville, Caddo Mills, Campbell, Merit, Greenville City Lakes, Greenville Club Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Lavon, Nevada, Josephine, Lone Oak, Neylandville, Kingston, Cash and Branch. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 79 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
